title: Au Revoir: Running Away from Home at Fifty
description: Born in 1950, Mary Moody is part of a generation of women who Had It All. At 50, her life was full with a fulfilling career, a husband, children and grandchildren. But the one thing missing was time for herself, so for six months she left her work, family and friends and went to live on her own in the south of France.
author: Mary Moody
